name: TVM802 Machine Data Export
description: Export TVM802 machine data and feeders templates from KiCad POS/positions files.
description_full:
KiCad action plugin that exports TVM802 pick-and-place (machine) CSV files from KiCad POS or positions.csv files.

Features:
- Supports classic KiCad POS format and simple Designator/Mid X/Mid Y/Rotation positions files.
- Generates full TVM802 machine data including panel and stack configuration.
- Generates an unconfigured feeders template CSV to assign feeders by component type.
- Lets you choose which FID* references are used as Mark 1 and Mark 2 fiducials.
